page.title: 05Religion in Heolgerrig.
page.content: In our block there are three chapels,two are in Heolgerrig and the other one is in Swansea Road.Also there is Cephas Church in Brondeg and it is Evangelical. Many people living in Heolgerrig go to other churches like Cyfarthfa ,Mormon or the Catholic church. About seventy people from Heolgerrig go to Cyfarthfa church and a lot of children from Heolgerrig go to Brownies or Cubs because they are held in the church hall. Salem is Welsh Congregational.Most of the service is in Welsh and a little Ennglish has been introduced. there are about fifty five members, thirty people attend on Sunday evenings,about twelve on Sunday morning. Salem started behind the Six Bells but has been in the present building on the main road since 1852.
